pci_data_sync_type_help: You can choose between a push, to sync to your data container or a pull, in the opposite direction.
pci_data_sync_directory: The following mount directory will be synced: {{ directory }}
pci_data_sync_all_directory: All your mount directories will be synced
pci_data_sync_error_message: An error has occurred syncing the data: {{ message }}.
